user_instruction: 'Tell John to reply to me (sarah@advantagemedia.com) with customer insights that can help with our marketing campaign, and remind him to check his Gmail for the necessary information.'

formatted_items.content:
Subject: Request for Customer Insights

Hi John,

I hope you’re doing well. Could you please send me any recent customer insights that might help us refine AdVantage Media’s upcoming marketing campaign? When you have a moment, kindly reply directly to me at sarah@advantagemedia.com.

Also, just a quick reminder to check your Gmail inbox—I’ve forwarded some background materials there that could be useful.

Thanks so much for your help!

Best regards,
Sarah

final_output:
Subject: Request for Customer Insights

Hi John,

I hope you’re doing well. Could you please send me any recent customer insights that might help us refine AdVantage Media’s upcoming marketing campaign? When you have a moment, kindly reply directly to me at sarah@advantagemedia.com.

Also, just a quick reminder to check your Gmail inbox—I’ve forwarded some background materials there that could be useful.

Thanks so much for your help!

Best regards,
Sarah
